description: Be My Mentor lets you lend your business skills to an entrepreneurs across the globe. New entrepreneurs often have a lot of questions, and donâ€™t always have a mentor to ask. As an entrepreneur, whenever you need business advice, our volunteers are happy to help. By posting your questions, you can communicate directly and solve a problem. As an experience business owner you can help pay it forward just by installing the Be My Mentor app.
author: Alex King
